column5: Hi, I am renting my extra bedroom here. Book it and you will feel like your own home. This room is also comes with a baby bed. Perfect for family with a kid.I am a very easy going person and will try my best to give you the best airbnb experience. I am only 10 mins away from DFW airport. I have kept the description minimal so that your expectation is lower, but I promise you wont be disappointed. Come and explore. Ask me any questions or concerns. Thanks for looking.
column8: Queen bed close to dfw, Irving
